value:
$WmMPID_リョウマ,ch05_01_Ryouma_M_Normal,Face|I am Ryoma, High Prince of Hoshido.
I wonder...how do you Nohrians hope
to stand any chance against me?$k$p$WmMPID_マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_Normal,Face|I am Xander, Crown Prince of Nohr!
We shall see how you Hoshidans fare
when you meet the edge of my blade!$k$p$WmMPID_カムイ女,ch05_19_Kamui_F_Normal,Face|B-brothers, I'm here too! Er, uh...
Let's do our best out there, green
team. Don't let them intimidate you!$k$p
